Description:
Home sweet home
If you're looking for your first or last home, look no further than this charming entertainer!
Your oversized master is complete with WIR and ensuite, and is cleverly located at the front of the home away from the other bedrooms. A large central lounge provides a much-needed second living space now that we're all spending more time at home. The open-plan kitchen/dining/living extends beautifully onto the alfresco and deck in the north-facing backyard, perfect for family gatherings and entertaining - in good time!
Relax and sooth the body of a night time in the undercover spa, and stay comfortable all year 'round with gas ducted heating and split system A/C.
Straight across the road from parkland and a short drive to Gateway Plaza, this quiet position is truly excellent.
Book your private inspection now to avoid disappointment.

Description:
Location and Lifestyle
Here's an opportunity to break into one of Leopold's best pockets and make your mark.
Bordered by parkland and situated in a quiet cul-de-sac, this home presents an excellent opportunity for first home buyers and investors alike. Low-maintenance, well-built and an abundance of indoor living and covered outdoor entertaining space, it has appeal for every buyer. Comprised of:
4 bedrooms, master with walk in robe, ensuite and split system heating and cooling
Newly tiled main bathroom with bath, powder room and laundry
Oversize double garage with internal house access
Gas central heating throughout, split system air-conditioning/heating and ceiling fans
Massive outdoor, undercover entertaining, dining and cooking area
Huge family living room and separate open plan dining/casual living space and kitchen
Bordering parkland, netball courts and a skate park and less than a
3 minute walk to the café's, restaurants and shopping at Gateway Plaza
Leopold's best value and best located home-walk to everything! A short drive to Queenscliff, the beaches of Ocean Grove or only 15 minutes into the centre of Geelong. It's easy to see why this region is booming.
At Wilsons we are conscious of playing our part in reducing the spread of COVID-19. We will therefore be conducting our property inspections using best practice sanitary measures to ensure everyone's safety. We can also arrange a virtual tour of the home if that better suits. Contact us today.

Description:
Space, Style And Central Location
An impressive outdoor entertaining zone, bright open-plan living, exceptionally stylish bathrooms and high quality finishings are some of the many highlights of this 3-bedroom family home set on a surprisingly large block in the heart of Leopold. Tucked away in a peaceful neighbourhood, it's within walking distance to sporting facilities, the bustling Gateway Plaza and serene Gateway Sanctuary, and just moments from Leopold Primary School and childcare options.
Bright and open, the main dining and living space is welcoming and sophisticated and comes with hardy, scratch-proof timber laminate flooring. The home's contemporary kitchen offers beautiful grey Caesarstone benchtops with a striking dark-coloured splashback, Technika oven/cooktop and Westinghouse dishwasher, and a fantastic Butler's pantry. The generous master suite has a WIR and modern ensuite featuring a walk-in shower, floor-to-ceiling light grey tiling, a black hexagonal-tile splashback and trendy matte black tapware. The bathroom with bath, vanity and separate WC shares the same stylish aesthetic, and services the minor bedrooms, each with triple BIRs and plush carpets. Ducted heating, a Fujitsu split system and ceiling fans take care of climate control, and push-button light switches throughout add extra class.
The spectacular undercover outdoor entertaining area can be fully-enclosed using state-of-the-art Ziptrak blinds, significantly extending the home's floor plan. Outdoor heaters maintain comfort on even the coldest nights, and extensive in-built cabinetry is ideal for housing the BBQ and bar fridge. The low-maintenance rear yard is spacious, with plenty of room for the kids and pets to roam; it has a garden shed, and a border of ornamental pear trees which provide a thick green privacy screen over summer, and let sunshine flood through during winter months.
Extras include an oversized DLUG, solar hot water, an integrated watering system and European laundry. This home has it all: space, style and a fantastic central location. Contact Liam for an inspection today.
- Central location close to shops, reserves, primary school and childcare
- High quality build on an exceptionally generous allotment
- Spectacular alfresco has Ziptrak blinds, heaters, in-built cabinetry and a TV point
- Master suite offers a WIR and a stylish ensuite with walk-in shower
- Contemporary kitchen comes with butler's pantry and Caesarstone benchtops
- Reach Geelong's CBD in a little over 10 minutes, and Melbourne in a bit over an hour

Description:
Location with a Family Home in mind.
When you talk about location in real estate, you don't get much better than this quality family home within walking distance to Leopold Primary School, Leopold Community Hub, Gateway Shopping Centre and the Leopold Sportsmans Club. Location, with entertaining and convenience in mind. Situated with sweeping views over Geelong from within the front living room and all on 693m2 approx!
Entering this beautiful home, you will be surprised by its natural size and what it has to offer. It boasts 3 generous sized bedrooms, all with built-in robes (main with updated en-suite and a walk-in robe), and spacious study / 4th bedroom. As you walk through the home, you have the front living room as mentioned with views overlooking Geelong adjacent to the formal dining area. The updated family bathroom is located centrally with a stand-alone shower. There is also an enormous light-filled, open plan living zone with Italian tiles throughout. It also features a large kitchen with a bench top / breakfast bench, ample cupboard space and quality stainless steel appliances. The spacious lounge features convenient gas wall heating. Adjoining the 2nd living space is an alfresco area, perfect for year-round entertaining / living. Add to this double remote lock-up garage plus workshop area (perfect for the tradie), split system cooling, and low maintenance garden allowing you to do what you want on the weekends. A must inspection

Description:
Luxury, Style & Space
With few words to describe the calibre of this stunning home, it is bound to blow you away from the moment you step through the front door. Displaying refined elegance throughout, this five-bedroom family home will cater to any family dynamic. Located in the highly sought after Birchbank Estate, positioned on a corner block in a private court location and set an on enormous allotment of 925m2 approx.
Offering 5 generous sized bedrooms, 3 impressive separate living zones, and an abundance of car accommodation. Every last detail has been taken care of, from the grand hallway that greets you upon entry, to the stunning rear yard that has been lovingly maintained. The home consists of a luxury main bedroom with walk in robe, private ensuite and an adjacent living room, perfect for a parent retreat area. The remaining four bedrooms are all serviced by the central bathroom and separate toilet.
The open plan kitchen, dining and living area provides the ultimate family friendly arrangement, as well as a perfect space to entertain. The immaculate kitchen will impress even the fastidious chef, including quality stainless steel appliances, step in pantry and large island bench. Located at the rear of the home is the 3rd living/ rumpus room, a space for the children to enjoy. This practical floorplan is completed by a large laundry with ample storage.
Outdoors has just as much on offer. With a magnificent alfresco area opening up from the open plan zone, indoor outdoor entertaining has never been so easy. Overlooking the fully landscaped gardens with plenty of room for family and pets to enjoy. In addition to all of this, the home has no shortage of space when it comes to vehicle accommodation. With an oversized double garage with drive through access to the rear yard, perfect for securely storing a boat, caravan or trailer, as well as side gate access to the large carport, providing ample storage possibilities. Added extras include ducted heating and split system cooling, ceiling fans, downlights, alarm security system and a water tank.
Only 10 minutes to Geelong CBD and 13 minutes to the ever-popular Ocean Grove beach. Make this your reality, an inspection is a must to truly understand the quality of this masterpiece on offer! Dont miss this one.

Description:
A STUNNING OPPORTUNITY TO BUILD YOUR DREAM!
This is your opportunity to secure a prime allotment of approx 585m2 in a sought after position in Clifton Springs surrounded by established quality homes. This fantastic site features a gentle elevation of the land allowing for spectacular bay views stretching from the You Yangs to the Geelong skyline. Enjoy an easy walk to the Clifton Springs bowling club, golf club, the stunning swimming beach at the Dell and a 2 minute drive to the popular and recently upgraded Clifton Springs boat ramp. Live life in style by the sea with everything the Bellarine Peninsula has to offer on your door step including award winning wineries, restaurants, schools, shops and medical centres. You will also enjoy easy access to Geelong or take the ferry from Portarlington to Melbourne. This is one not to be missed!!!

Description:
Sold Before Advertising
With views of Greater Geelong, Corio Bay and the You Yangs this beautiful refurbished home offers the luxurious lifestyle you deserve.
The two spacious living areas feature high ceilings, an indoor fireplace and a magnificent barn style door, all adding to the character of the home. A convenient study is tucked into the back of the main lounge area.
The sun-washed north-facing master bedroom features a walk in robe and ensuite, floor to ceiling windows and door to your very own private balcony.
The refurbished kitchen will delight enthusiastic of cooks with stainless steel appliances, gas cooking, a walk in pantry and to the side, a dining area fit for a family. Outside a perfect entertainment space all year round featuring an open fire, vertical garden and grass space for the kids or pets to enjoy.
Plenty of parking is provided with a double garage with internal access and a double carport

Description:
A light filled, renovated and ready to go!
This lovely renovated 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom brick home with on approx 570m2 has everything you would need and more. Elevated on Cresta Street in Leopold it provides a comfortable light filled home, ideal for entertaining and easy living. The layout has the master bedroom with ensuite and double walk in robe at the front of the home. Opposite the master bedroom is the sunken lounge which features polished floating floors and plantation shutters and a wood fire. Down the hall is the attractive galley kitchen with walk in pantry 900ml gas cooktop, 600ml electric oven, dishwasher and plenty of cupboard and bench space. The dining/2nd living space is located next to the kitchen and beyond this the 2nd bedroom. The remaining 2 bedrooms, laundry and central bathroom are located down the rear hallway. The kitchen looks out to the northern aspect with alfresco and leafy low maintenance garden and workshop. In addition to the wood fire there is gas underfloor heating and cooling for all year round climate control and comfort. Conveniently located it is close to schools, and only moments from Leopold's Gateway Plaza. So if you're looking for a family home with nothing to do but move in you'll love this one. With the stakes in Leopold rising and rising this it's a great place to enter the property market for both owner occupiers and investors alike. Rental estimate at $400pw. Be quick to inspect because this one won't last!

Description:
Neat as a pin and ready to go!
This impressive 3-bedroom, 2 bath, 1 living zone plus study home has everything you would need and more. Comprising floating timber floors through all the traffic area the home has a neat entry with study space/ 2nd lounge to the left. Beyond this is the large main bedroom with ensuite with oversized shower recess and large walk in robe. Further into the home has internal access to the 2-car garage and generous laundry on the right. Beyond this the hall opens to the kitchen dining and lounge space. This is really the hub of the home and features a deluxe kitchen with 40ml stone bench and 900ml gas cooktop and walk in pantry which houses the fridge. Separated by another hallway are the remaining bedrooms with Built in Robes and central bathroom with bath and shower. The north facing alfresco is accessed via the living room through sliding doors and features pull down blinds for added protection and comfort even during the cooler months! At the rear is a lawn area and low maintenance garden along the back fence. This really is a lovely package and an ideal first home, downsizer or investment with an estimated return of $400/week. With the stakes in Leopold rising and rising you'll need to be quick to secure this one!

Description:
Enticing Charm With Exciting Possibilities!
Instantly appealing, 3 Wanawong Court offers a wonderful opportunity for first home buyers, downsizers or renovators with an eye for the future to see the unlimited possibilities this property has to offer. Classic in design this home offers a clean, blank palette to create the ultimate family home or solid investment opportunity. Featuring a classic floorplan design, complemented by 3 bedrooms with built in robes and a spacious formal lounge/dining area which gives a wonderful sense of space. The practical kitchen is offset by a large living room which leads to the low maintenance private backyard. What sets this property apart from the majority of the residential homes in Clifton Springs is the ability to park your boat or caravan off the street. Undeniably, the location is highly sought after being closely located to all the lifestyle pursuits that the Bellarine Peninsula is renowned for, a short stroll to public transport, excellent array of the area's finest schools, public or private, multiple choice of shopping centres close by & access to the Bellarine Peninsula's world class restaurants & wineries. An inspection is a must to fully appreciate this beautiful home.

Description:
Hamptons Inspired Home with Family Focused Living & Seamless Entertaining
ON The Market
Perfectly picturesque with superb interior proportions, this Hamptons inspired home delivers enormous indoor-outdoor family appeal! Fully renovated and showcasing period elegance, modern style and a fabulously functional family floorplan, all complimented by the beautiful presentation in this ideal landscaped setting.
This showstopper reveals stunning open living and dining domains accompanied by a well-equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances, 900mm gas cooktop and oven, plenty of storage plus a dishwasher. Featuring three bedrooms with built in robes, master with walk in robe and a convenient powder room; the large family bathroom presents floor to ceiling tiling, single basin, shower, and toilet.
Step out to the undercover deck prime for entertaining or simply enjoying a cup of coffee adjoining the manicured back yard with garden shed and a second undercover entertainment zone ready for your next family BBQ.
Lavished with period features, shutters, new floorboards and carpet throughout, freshly painted, solar panels, split system heating and cooling, Coonara wood heater, ceiling fans in main living and dining area plus electric heating all these seamlessly combine to meet the modern lifestyle considerations.
This home is finished off with ample car accommodation! There is off street parking in the long driveway with side access, plus a substantial 6 car garage which can be used for extra entertainment space, car/ boat storage the list goes on.
Set on approximately 675m2 of land, this charming fully featured home also boasts easy access to local shops, Leopold Primary school, walking tracks, parks and bike trails. Public transport only a stone's throw away and moments from some of the best surf coast beaches the Bellarine Peninsula has to offer! This is a property you will truly want to call your own.
Roncon Real Estate Always ON!

Description:
Set to Tick All of Your Boxes
Nestled in a well-established and highly sought-after pocket of Leopold, this brick veneer, family home puts the elements in place for a charming lifestyle! The convenient floorplan has it all; with an exceptionally well planned and organized layout to suit everyday living.
Situated on a corner allotment (605m2 approx.) within close proximity to the expansive Gateway Plaza - placing cafes, eateries, and big brand stores right at your fingertips. Growing families are taken great care of with Leopold Kindergarten and Leopold Primary School at easy reach, public transport is conveniently close by, while easy access to the Leopold Community Hub, Gateway Sanctuary, and local sporting grounds is an added bonus.
Upon entering this immaculate home, you are greeted by a foyer that flows through to the formal lounge room that sets the high standard for the rest of the home. The formal lounge is bathed in natural sunlight and offers a built-in bar, perfect for the entertainer. The formal dining room creates a peaceful spot separated from the spacious open plan living zone which is large in size and offers ample space for the whole family to enjoy. The immaculate timber kitchen comprises stunning stone benchtops, updated appliances including electric cooktop, built-in oven, built-in pantry and breakfast bar. Offering sliding glass doors which open up to the beautiful, undercover alfresco area- with the option to enclose with weather blinds this space is perfect for all-year-round use.
The main bedroom offers a walk-through robe providing ample storage, while the private, updated ensuite is complete with a shower, vanity and toilet. Three additional bedrooms offer built-in robes and utilize the main bathroom and separate toilet. Completing the floorplan inside is a massive laundry with plentiful storage and external access.
As an added bonus, this property has a remote double car garage, as well as, secure side gate access perfect for caravan or boat storage. All this is complemented by immaculately manicured gardens, with numerous fruit trees surrounding, including apple, lemon and nectarine trees.
Extras include a garden shed for extra storage, solar panels, ducted gas heating throughout and water tank.
If youre looking for a beautiful home to raise your family, then this property is the perfect choice. Be sure to put this one on the top of your list!

Address: 94 Bay Shore Avenue Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
FHOG + Home Builders grant = $45,000
With the available grants from the government for building new, why would you consider any other option.
Property near the water with the best of views tends to be tightly held. Until now.......
Take advantage of the opportunity to secure a well-positioned, established 613m2 (approx.) allotment with incredible Northerly and Westerly views available from a 2nd storey at a fraction of the price of buying in a new estate.
Clifton Springs land with views is very affordable and is a well-kept secret on the Bellarine. The location of this block offers a short walk to the beach and family reserves at "The Dell" offering BBQ areas, rotundas and a magical setting on a private, child friendly beach.
The golf course, bistro & bowls club are also a short walk away.
A quick trip by car will deliver you to a number of the Peninsula's best attractions including award winning wineries, historical sites, great beaches, regular markets, annual events AND neighbours Queenscliff where you can jump on the ferry and enjoy a day trip on the Mornington Peninsula. And now with the ferry service from Portarlington to Melbourne, living on the Bellarine Peninsula has never been so convenient.
Call Dion today on 0424 940 629 to learn more.

Description:
2 Homes in 1 !
The Feel:
Explore the versatility offered by a property that can be configured as either one home with up to 5 beds/2 living, or dual occupancy with a main house plus fully self-contained living for extended family or Airbnb rental opportunity. Breathtaking panoramic views of Corio Bay & the You Yangs are enjoyed from the storybook master bedroom & new upper deck, with vantage points also from the ground floor. Vaulted ceilings, gas & wood fire heaters, ducted heating, plus SSAC add ultimate comfort to this home situated in tranquil pocket of Clifton Springs.
The Facts:
-Impressive character-filled home on 780sqm approx. elevated site overlooking world class vista
-Positioned to capture breathtaking views of Corio Bay, the You Yangs & surrounding countryside
-Ficus trees & jasmine herald your arrival, from a timber boardwalk to an expansive 360 verandah
-4-5BR residence + 3 bathrooms, study nook, 2 living/dining rooms, 2 kitchens & laundries
-Main kitchen features large countertops & Bosch double oven & Bosch dishwasher with Samsung cooktop
-Second kitchen has Kleenmaid electric wall oven, gas cooktop & ample storage
-Gas log fireplace with mantelpiece delivers lifestyle appeal to the formal living & dining zone
-Woodfire heater in family living room with sliding door to front deck
-High ceilings & timber flooring extend the sense of space
-Master bedroom with bay views from dorma windows, + ensuite & BIR
-Panoramic bay views from multiple bedrooms with upstairs offering versatile bed or 3rd living
-Shared access interconnected bathroom downstairs with bay views, shower, vanity & toilet
-Well-built home with thermal efficiency (roof insulated with lambs wool)
-Garden workshop + remote control double garaging with insulation & powder coated steel shelving
-Established garden with raised veggie boxes, citrus trees, 6,800L of rainwater for garden
-Additional features include: ducted heating/cooling, LED lights, ceiling fans & security alarm system
-Enjoy all that the Bellarine has to offer: wineries, farms, eateries, coffee shops, distilleries, breweries and fresh seafood/ produce!
-A few short minutes by car to Portarlington-Melbourne passenger Ferry
- Only 25 mins to Geelong and rail stations commuting to Melbourne
SELF CONTAINED UNIT comprises (if closed off from main house):
-Set up a games room/teenagers retreat, accommodate extra family, or Airbnb from this space!
-Private entry to carpeted living & dining room with gas log fire & ceiling fan
-Full size kitchen with bamboo flooring, Kleenmaid electric wall oven, gas cooktop & ample storage
-Bathroom with new shower screen & tapware, plus separate toilet
-2 bedrooms (1 downstairs with BIR, 1 upstairs with storybook character, bay views, en suite & BIR)
The Owner Loves.
We have always loved watching the ships sail by from our bedroom, & the upper deck allows us to share the incredible bay views with friends its glorious at sunset. This home offers us the flexibility of using it in its entirety, or closing off the south end for fully self-sufficient stays.

Description:
Tidy home in a peaceful pocket.
IMPORTANT NOTICE REGARDING COVID-19:
Open for inspections will no longer be scheduled for the public. To organise your own private viewing, please contact Deane Hughes on 0407 926 659 or Kingston Wade on 0438 033 999.
Situated in a private and peaceful pocket of ever-popular Leopold, this neat and tidy 3-bedroom home is perfect for those searching for a first home, investment or downsizer.
On entry, the hallway leads to the light-filled and open plan kitchen, living and dining area which opens out to a spacious backyard and side courtyard.
The kitchen features a gas cooktop, electric oven, dishwasher, and plentiful cupboard space. Accommodation is comprised of 3 spacious bedrooms with built-in robes, the main bedroom with walk-in robe, a clever 2-way bathroom offers a separate toilet and adjoins the main bedroom and hallway. Outside, the concreted entertaining area is great for summer entertaining and could be further enhanced by the addition of a pergola. (STCA) The large and secure backyard is ideal for those with pets or young children.
Notable features include:
- Split system air conditioning
- Gas wall heater
- Ceiling fans in all bedrooms and living area
- Freshly painted walls and ceilings throughout
- Single garage with front and rear roller door
Located just down the road from the Estuary Reserve, just 3 minutes' drive to the Gateway Plaza, as well as being about 20 minutes' drive from Geelong and the Surf Coast, there is a lot to like about this package!

Description:
The Perfect Starter or Investment
Located a short stroll to the heart of Drysdale and all its conveniences from schools to shops this solid brick home is the perfect starter, investment or downsizer. Beautifully maintained by the current owner the flexible floor plan will suit all families large and small. Included are 3 generous bedrooms, master include WIR and ensuite while the two remaining bedrooms have BIRs and are serviced by the family bathroom and separate toilet.
The formal lounge room includes home office and bar while the separate kitchen/dining/family room enjoys views of beautiful gardens plus huge undercover entertaining area perfect for all year round entertaining.
Some of the many extras include gas log fire, evaporate cooling, gas wall furnace, plenty of storage space double garage with internal access and garden shed. With potential to add your own touches too this is a house you will be proud to call home.

Description:
Charming Family Home In Great Location
This home is also available to inspect by Virtual Tour. Don't hesitate to contact us for more information.
Situated in a lovely elevated position, this solid brick 3 bedroom home, "Nyora" (meaning Cherry Tree) presents an ideal prospect for the first home buyer or investor. This traditional home occupies a desirable position in a family friendly neighbourhood close to schools, shops, the iconic Bellarine rail trail and just 15 minutes to Geelong.
On a generous block of land, flourishing roses line the path to the welcoming front verandah featuring federation tiles which complement the red earthy tones of the brickwork. Secure and privatised from the street the home features multiple living and dining areas. The kitchen is central to the open plan design with sliding doors opening out onto a paved and covered alfresco area.
The master bedroom with ensuite and WIR is located at the front of the house with a separate wing comprising 2 further bedrooms with built in robes, central bathroom with separate WC and spacious laundry with outside access.
Lots of potential with the generous sized garden, and plenty of parking and storage options with two single lock up garages with rear roller door access. With sweeping views across Geelong, "Nyora" is waiting for potential purchasers to stamp their own personality on this well positioned home.
- Elevated position on generous sized block
- Ideal for first home buyer or investor
- Close to schools, shops, rail trail
- Multiple living and dining areas
- Kitchen with breakfast bar
- Two single lock up garages

Description:
Storybook Charm
Radiating character and charm, this Clifton Springs home will tug at the heartstrings, while offering convenient and practical living.
First impressions are lasting and, in this instance, will leave your wanting more. A private and secure fence allowing you to enjoy the manicured front garden, with a full-length verandah and front alfresco.
Neat as a pin, the kitchen is equipped with electric cooking, dishwasher and ample storage overlooking the dining area. A separate living with an inviting gas feature fire completes the fore of the home. 3 bedrooms sit from the central hallway; master with walk-in-robe and ensuite, with built-in-robes in the remaining 2 bedrooms. The rear of the home hosts a sundrenched 2nd living and study nook, which effortlessly flows through to a fully enclosed outdoor deck; the perfect space to bask in the sun and enjoy the enviable northern aspect. The central family bathroom with shower, bath and feature vanity, separate toilet and laundry with outdoor entry complete this ideal package.
Manicured gardens both front and back offer a wealth of options to sit and enjoy your morning coffee in your own private oasis.
Additional features include heating and cooling, character features throughout, 602m2 parcel, tandem carport and an oversized single garage a higher than usual entry.
Located in a peaceful pocket of Clifton Springs, you're only minutes away from all amenities, public transport, schools and cafes. Make your Bellarine move today and enjoy everything that we have to offer!
